entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Carman
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Carman 9:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -22.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -26.3°C
Wind: SW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
